arts.ttl: Frustration for Mainz and Kiel after 1-1 draw
arts.sum: Mainz and Holstein Kiel lost grip of their battles at both ends of the table.

arts.ttl: Relegation-threatened Holstein Kiel hold Champions League-chasing Mainz to draw
arts.sum: Mainz entered the match unbeaten in their last nine home games, while Kiel had won only one of their previous 10 Bundesliga fixtures. In the 64th minute, Steven Skrzybski's header hit the post for Kiel, and moments later, Zentner denied Armin Gigović from close range.

arts.ttl: Mainz vs. Holstein Kiel preview: Champions League hopefuls host cellar-dwellers
arts.sum: Bo Henriksen’s side aim to return to winning ways in a home game against Bundesliga’s debutant.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mainz 05 vs. Holstein Kiel - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Mainz 05 and Holstein Kiel, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
